data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta
data.expected_result: The new channel topic should be saved or the menu closed
data.short_description: App crashes when editing channel topic and clicking close or save button at the same time
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel - Click on the channel name - Edit the channel topic - Click the close or save button there while typing in the channel topic (try it multiple times if you can't reproduce it at the beginning)
